overview_of_class: Fundamental understanding of vehicle handling and ride performance; Dynamics and stability of vehicles; Modeling of the behavior of vehicles and vehicle subsystems including tires, steering, suspension and brakes;  Aerodynamics of vehicles; Electric vehicles; Emphasis on problem formulation and problem solution.
name: Special Topics in Mechanical Engineering
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 395-0-20 Special Topics in Mechanical Engineering
